net.sf.microlog.appender
Class FormAppender

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.microlog.appender.AbstractAppender
      net.sf.microlog.appender.FormAppender
All Implemented Interfaces:
Appender
public class FormAppender
extends AbstractAppender

An Appender that appends the logging to a Form. Each logging is appended as a StringItem. The log is cleared by deleting all the items in the Form. Thus the Form has to be a dedicated Form for logging purposes. The LogForm is a convenience class for logging purposes.

Since:
0.1
Author:
Johan Karlsson (johan.karlsson@jayway.se)

clearLog

public void clearLog()
Clear the underlying RecordStore from data. Note if logging is done when executing this method, these new logging events are not cleared.

Specified by:
